meanings.definition: A person or thing that utilizes something.
meanings.sent1: The utilizers of the tools were skilled craftsmen.
meanings.sent2: The utilizers of the new technology were excited about its potential.
meanings.sent3: The utilizers of the broken umbrella tried to use it as a makeshift tent.
meanings.sent4: The utilizers of knowledge are like bees collecting nectar from flowers.
meanings.sent5: The utilizers of the library made sure to return their books on time.

meanings.definition: The act of utilizing or making use of something.
meanings.sent1: Efficient utilizers of time always finish their tasks early.
meanings.sent2: The utilizers of the available resources were able to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The utilizers of the old car managed to turn it into a unique art installation.
meanings.sent4: The utilizers of creativity can transform simple ideas into masterpieces.
meanings.sent5: The utilizers of the public transportation system saved money on gas.
